articles.title: First Mover Asia: Bitcoin, Altcoins Rebound Amid Light Trading - CoinDesk
articles.description: Bitcoin topped $42,500 on Sunday after reaching its lowest mark since late September the day before; ether reaches over $3,200.
articles.content: Bitcoin pushed past the $42,000 level over the weekend, after last weeks broad market bloodbath, which sent the No. 1 cryptocurrency by market capitalization spiraling toward $40,000 from about $48,0… [+159 chars]

articles.title: 'Be careful of your family's safety': Taiwanese actor Chen Ting gets death threat over TV role - AsiaOne
articles.description: TAIPEI - Chen Ting has received a death threat to his two children - all because of his role as a villain in a television serial which chronicles the family war surrounding a pair of separated Siamese twins. The Taiwanese actor, who plays Liang Chin-chuan in …
